name: Dyl's Destiny Pre-Alpha
description:
Discover Your Destiny

Inspired by many games of the past, our rag tag team of nobodies got together in order to create a new plot driven masterpiece. Our goal is to bring to life a new adventure with unique platformer gameplay that still captures the essence and spirit of the games we know and love. Since many of us are starting from scratch, our main goal is to learn. We hope to share with you the process we take and the adventure we live as we bring Dyl's Destiny to life.

v 0.1.5 Fixes and Improvements:

  • Revamped combat systems to improve hit detection
  • Returned double jump to it's former glory
  • Added crowd to cheer Dyl to victory against boss
  • Added Sprint ability (click in left stick, or press left control)
  • Added omni-directional roll dodge
    • Press X and pick the direction with the left stick or WASD
    • This replaces the left trigger/right trigger dodge
  • Moved Tail Whip to right trigger
  • Made trap section more apparent and easier to get to
  • Replaced the mosquito path with a trap path
  • Made enemies less frustrating
    • Purple frog puddles only do 1 damage
    • Colliders on purple puddles are more forgiving
    • Mosquitoes can't do damage when injured
    • Spiders and snakes can now be killed
  • Enhanced jungle background music
  • Improved camera performance
  • Improved visibility of first puzzle
  • Fixed Dyl occasionally playing death animation on respawn
